ptp:process-type.name: Aggregate QC (Library Validation) 5.0

parameter.name: Aggregate QC Flags and Copy Fields
parameter.string: bash -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {processURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:setUDF -f 'Progress' -t '//input/@uri->//sample/@uri' -v 'Library preparation and QC validation complete' script:aggregateQC -c 'true' -a 'true' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid0} -aggregatelog {compoundOutputFileLuid1} -copylog {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Aggregation Script Log,QC Flag Aggregation Log,QC UDF Copy Log}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display and maximize the Input/Output Explorer mini-tabbed page

parameter.name: 2.Parse CaliperGX CSV
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {processURI:v2} -u {username} -p {password} script:parseCSV -inputFile {compoundOutputFileLuid2} -log {compoundOutputFileLuid3} -headerRow '1' -separator 'comma' -containerName 'Plate Name' -wellPosition 'Well Label' -measurementUDFMap 'Concentration::Region[50-4500] Conc. (ng/ul)' -measurementUDFMap 'Size (bp)::Region[50-4500] Size [BP]' -measurementUDFMap 'Size at Max (bp)::Region[50-4500] Size at Maximum [BP]' -measurementUDFMap 'Molarity (nmol/L)::Region[50-4500] Molarity (nmol/l)' -matchOutput 'true' -relaxed 'true' script:assignQC -log {compoundOutputFileLuid4} -qcResult {compoundOutputFileLuid5}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Driver File,Driver File Log,CaliperGX WellTable (CSV required),CaliperGX Parsing Log File,QC Assignment Log File,QC Assignment Report,CaliperGX Report}

ptp:process-type.name: DNA Samples QC

parameter.name: 2.Assign Concentration from Submitted Samples
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -exp 'if (submittedSample.hasValue( ::Sample Conc.:: )) {output.::Concentration:: = submittedSample.::Sample Conc.::}; if (submittedSample.hasValue( ::Sample Conc Units:: )) {output.::Conc. Units::=submittedSample.::Sample Conc Units::} ; if (input.hasValue( ::Concentration:: )) {output.::Concentration:: = input.::Concentration::}; if (input.hasValue( ::Conc. Units:: )) {output.::Conc. Units:: = input.::Conc. Units::}; ' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid0}"

parameter.name: 3.Assign QC flags
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -exp 'if (output.::Concentration:: >= step.::Concentration Threshold (ng/uL):: ) {output.QC = true} else {output.QC = false}' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid2}"

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

ptp:process-type.name: Library Batch

parameter.name: 1. Auto Exit libVolume update
parameter.string: bash -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -exp 'input.::Library Volume (ul):: = input.::Library Volume (ul):: - output.::Library Volume (ul)::;' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid0}"

parameter.name: 2. Auto Copy InputToOutput
parameter.string: bash -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -exp 'if (input.hasValue(::Sample Tag::)) {output.::Sample Tag:: = input.::Sample Tag::} else {output.::Sample Tag::=::N/A::} ; if (input.hasValue(::Library Volume (ul)::)) {output.::Library Volume (ul):: = input.::Library Volume (ul)::} else {output.::Library Volume (ul)::=::-99::};' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid0}"

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Place samples in same shape as input samples

ptp:process-type.name: qPCR QC 5.0 McGill 1.0

parameter.name: 1. Volume Adjustment
parameter.string: bash -l -c "/opt/gls/clarity/bin/java -jar /opt/gls/clarity/extensions/ngs-common/v5/EPP/ngs-extensions.jar -i {stepURI:v2:http} -u {username} -p {password} script:evaluateDynamicExpression -t false -h false -excludeControls true -exp ' input.::Library Volume (ul):: = input.::Library Volume (ul)::-output.::Volume Used (ul):: ' -log {compoundOutputFileLuid3}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:Excel Driver file,Assignment Log File,qPCR Report File (Excel)}

ptp:process-type.process-type-attribute: Place samples in same shape as input samples
Display the UDF information associated with all the outputs

parameter.name: 3. Route by python
parameter.string: bash -c "/usr/bin/python /opt/gls/clarity/customextensions/Common/route_by_template.py -u {username} -p {password} -s {stepURI:v2} -r 'Go To Next Step,False,Affymetrix Axiom Genotyping McGill 1.0,DNA Amplification McGill 1.1\nGo To Next Step,True,Sample Normalization,Sample Normalization Extra Plate' -l {compoundOutputFileLuid0}"

process-output.output-name: {LIST:CSV file for robot,Log file,Log2 file,CSV file for manual }

cnf:field.name: Library Kit Name
cnf:field.preset: NxSeq AmpFREE Low DNA Library Kit

cnf:field.name: Primers Sequence
cnf:field.preset: AAT GAT ACG GCG ACC ACC GAG A, CAA GCA GAA GAC GGC ATA CGA G /5 uM

epp-trigger.name: Aggregate QC Flags and Copy Fields
